A report has been logged and a team of b: En rapport er loggført og et team med feilsøkende ekorn har blitt sendt for å håndtere situasjonen.
Password reset not enabled. Contact your: Tilbakestilling av passord er ikke aktivert. Kontakt administratoren din.
Enter your email address below and we'll: Legg inn e-postadressen din nedenfor, og vi sender deg en lenke for å sette et nytt passord.
Enter your new password below: Skriv inn ditt nye passord nedenfor
Password reset. Log in with your new pas: Passordet er endret. Logg inn med det nye passordet
You have requested a link to change your: Du har bedt om en lenke for å endre passordet ditt. Du kan gjøre dette via denne linken:
If you did not request this, please igno: Hvis du ikke ba om dette, kan du ignorere denne e-posten.
Your password will not change until you: Passordet ditt endres ikke før du åpner lenken ovenfor og angir et nytt.
Restart server. Try reloading the page a: Start serveren på nytt. Prøv å laste siden inn på nytt etter noen sekunder etter at du har trykket på denne knappen.
Hosting on this site is provided for fre: Hosting on this site is provided for free and with no guarantee of availability or security of your application.
This facility is intended solely for you: This facility is intended solely for you to evaluate the suitability of Saltcorn.
If you would like to store private infor: If you would like to store private information that needs to be secure, please use self-hosted Saltcorn.
Please select a name for your applicatio: Velg et navn for applikasjonen din. Navnet bestemmer adressen der den vil være tilgjengelig.
Success! Your new application is availab: Hurra! Din nye applikasjon er tilgjengelig på:
Please click the above link now to creat: Klikk på lenken ovenfor nå for å lage den første brukeren.
A site with this subdomain already exist: En siden med dette subdomenet eksisterer allerede
Four different ways to get started using: Fire måter å start bruk av Saltcorn på
Start by creating the tables to hold you: Start med å lage tabller til dataene dine
When you have created the tables, you ca: Når du har opprettet tabellene, kan du opprette visninger slik at brukerne kan samhandle med dataene.
Du kan også starte med å lage en side.
You can skip creating a table by hand by: You can skip creating a table by hand by uploading a CSV file from a spreadsheet.
If you have a backup from a previous Sal: If you have a backup from a previous Saltcorn instance, you can also restore it.
Instead of building, get up and running: Instead of building, get up and running in no time with packs
Packs are collections of tables, views a: Packs are collections of tables, views and plugins that give you a full application which you can then edit to suit your needs.
Name: Navn
The Wiki contains the documentation and: The Wiki contains the documentation and tutorials on installing and using Saltcorn
The YouTube channel has some video tutor: The YouTube channel has some video tutorials
You can copy the pack contents below to: You can copy the pack contents below to another Saltcorn installation.

Choose views for search results for each table.
Set to blank to omit table from global search.
Table saved with version history enabled: Table saved with version history enabled
Label: Merkelapp
APIs allow developers access to your dat: APIs allow developers access to your data without using a user interface
Felter definerer kolonnene i tabellen din.
First, please give some basic informatio: First, please give some basic information about the view.
Views are based on a view template: Views are based on a view template
A short name that will be in your URL: A short name that will be in your URL
Title: Tittel
The root page is the page that is served: Rotsiden er siden som vises når brukeren besøker hjemstedet (/). Dette kan angis for hver brukerrolle.
A default value is required when adding: En standardverdi kreves når du legger til obligatoriske felt i tabeller som ikke er enkle
Please create your first user account, w: Please create your first user account, which will have administrative privileges. You can add other users and give them administrative privileges later.
Views define how table rows are displaye: Views define how table rows are displayed to the user
